sentences.en: All the doors have been bricked up to deter vandals.
sentences.cn: 所有的门都用砖堵了起来，防止破坏分子闯入。

sentences.en: Arming the police doesn't deter crime.
sentences.cn: 仅仅靠给警察配备武器是无法制止犯罪的。

sentences.en: But that should not deter us from seeing its nobility and universality.
sentences.cn: 但这不应阻碍我们看到它的高贵和普遍性.

sentences.en: Capital punishment is claimed to deter wrongdoing even better than lifelong confinement.
sentences.cn: 死刑之所以需要是因为它在制止犯罪方面甚至比终身监禁更有效.

sentences.en: Do not let failure deter you.

sentences.cn: 狗能够阻拦不受欢迎的闯入者.

sentences.en: Failure did not deter him ( from making another attempt ).
sentences.cn: 他并未因失败而 畏缩不前.

sentences.en: Never deter till tomorrow that which you can do today.
sentences.cn: 今日事须今日毕,切勿拖延到明天.

sentences.en: Supporters of the death penalty argue that it would deter criminals from carrying guns.
sentences.cn: 死刑的支持者辩称，死刑可以阻止罪犯携带枪支。

sentences.en: The company’s financial difficulties have deterred potential investors.
sentences.cn: 该公司的财务困境令潜在的投资者望而却步。

sentences.en: The shadow already fallen, and nothing you do will deter it.
sentences.cn: 巨大的阴影已经降下, 无论你怎么做都无法阻止这一切.

sentences.en: The wild weather did not deter some people from swimming in the sea.
sentences.cn: 尽管风雨交加，一些人还是会下海游泳。

sentences.en: The windows are covered with grilles to deter vandals.
sentences.cn: 窗戶都安上了铁柵栏,以防止故意破坏.

sentences.en: These difficulties, these differences, should not deter us.
sentences.cn: 这些困难和差异不应该使我们踌躇不前.

sentences.en: This is likely to deter stringent environmental regulations.
sentences.cn: 这就很可能阻止严厉的环境管制.

sentences.en: Timber is often treated with creosote to deter rot.
sentences.cn: 木材常用杂酚油涂抹以防腐烂.

trans.tran_en: to stop someone from doing something, by making them realize it will be difficult or have bad results
